result.execSummary:
The defendant Dashon Velaquice Young was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500 [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Restitution in the amount $800.00 to the victim Eslam H. up to 25% of prison funds with the balance due prior to the end of the Extended Supervision on case 14CF004681.  Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.

Concurrent with: STRAIGHT TIME, in the House of Correction, concurrent to any other sentence with credit for 6 days time served.
No contact with the vicitm, Eslam H.

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Statements made as to Sentencing by both counsel and Defendant.

COURT ORDERED Defendant to serve 6 MONTHS, STRAIGHT TIME, in the House of Correction, concurrent to any other sentence with credit for 6 days time served.  

COURT ORDERED THE FOLLOWING CONDITIONS:
*  Pay the MANDATORY costs only up to 25% of prison funds with the balance due prior to the end of the Extended Supervision on case 14CF004681.  Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  Restitution in the amount $800.00 to the victim Eslam H. up to 25% of prison funds with the balance due prior to the end of the Extended Supervision on case 14CF004681.  Failure to pay shall result in a Civil Judgment with tax intercept.
*  No contact with the victim, Eslam H.

Received and filed with court:
*  Pretrial Incarceration Credit Form
*  Restitution Work Sheet

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Defendant waived rights and pled GULTY.  Guilty Plea Questionnaire received and filed.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Parties stipulate to the facts of the complaint as a basis for a guilty plea.  Court found the Defendant guilty as charged in the complaint.  Judgment of Conviction entered.  Parties are prepared to proceed with Sentencing.
COURT ORDERED DEFENDANT PRODUCED FROM DODGE FOR PURPOSES OF THE PROJECTED GUILTY PLEA AND SENTENCING IN BRANCH 4.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young not in court, in custody.  Margaret Anne Kunisch appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant not produced from Dodge for purposes of this hearing.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for February 23, 2016 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Dashon Velaquice Young not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case scheduled for plea/sentencing hearing.  Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Defense requests a jury trial date, does not want a final pretrial date.  Court ordered case adjourned for status conference and jury trial to Branch 45.  Status conference scheduled for February 8, 2016 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for March 9, 2016 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Dashon Velaquice Young not in court, in custody.  Joanne L Hardtke appeared for the State of Wisconsin. CMC. Defense requests an adjourned Plea and Sentencing date. Court grants defense request. Case adjourned to branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for December 4, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Dashon Velaquice Young not in court, in custody.  Alex T. Mueller appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant NOT produced. Court pre-approved transfer of this case for global resolution to Judge Conen.   Parties are notified that effective September 14, 2015 this case will be reassigned to Judge Michelle Ackerman Havas, Branch 45 in Room 515 of the Courthouse.  Case set for Plea & Sentencing in branch 45.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 30, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke in court, defendant Dashon Velaquice Young not in court, in custody.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant not produced, appearance waived.  Statements by defense counsel that defendant has 3 pending felony cases.  Defense requests a status conference date after the felony trial.  Parties are notified that effective August 3, 2015 this case will be reassigned per rotation to Judge Lindsey Grady, Branch 23 in Courthouse room 515.  Status conference scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Case heard off the record. Defense counsel requests case be set for antother status conference. Neither party requests to address the court on the record. Signed, Filed & Distributed, Agreed Upon Request for A New Court Date form. Case adjourned to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Sarah McNutt appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
For reasons stated on the record, defense requests to vacate Jury trial date of 5-13-2015 and schedule a status conference date.  Court orders 5-13-2015 Jury trial date vacated.  Case adjourned for status to Branch 46.  Status conference scheduled for May 11, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel appeared but never returned.  We could not contact him.  Defendant had to pick up his child so court adjourned final pretrial.   Court ordered case adjourned for final pre-trial conference in Branch 46.  Case remains set for 5-13-2015 jury trial. jks
  Final pre-trial scheduled for 05-06-2015 at 08:30 am.
State's Motion in Limine received and filed with court.
State's Requested Jury Instructions received and filed with court.
STATE'S WITNESS LIST AND PROPOSED JURY INSTRUCTIONS, filed. jks

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court with attorney Matthew Adrian Lamke.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Court ordered case adjourned for final pre-trial conference and jury trial  in Branch 46. jks

Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with ESLAM H.
  Court advised defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

ADDRESS INFO for Dashon Velaquice Young

Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in court with attorney Kathleen Judith Osvat.  Defendant Dashon Velaquice Young in custody.  Elizabeth Longo appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk:  hgj.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Reserve Branch 46.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for March 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
